summary: The diff implements all three requirements. REQ-1 is addressed by adding invalidateQueries + refetchQueries in useAddSaree and useUpdateSaree onSuccess handlers. REQ-2 is addressed by introducing a shared QUERY_KEYS constant with staleTime:0/gcTime:0/refetchOnMount:'always' in useGetAllSarees, used consistently across pages. REQ-3 is addressed by the SareeImage component in Catalog.tsx using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for proper image rendering. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: A manual refresh button added to the filter bar in the Catalog page
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a manual refresh button in the catalog UI. This is an extra UI element not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: A background 'Updating...' indicator shown during background refetches in the Catalog page
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not request any loading or updating indicator UI in the catalog.

hallucinated_features.description: useEffect on mount calls refetch() in Catalog.tsx to always load fresh data on every mount
hallucinated_features.reason: An explicit refetch on every catalog mount is not specified in the requirements; requirements only ask for cache invalidation to trigger re-fetch after admin mutations.
